Lunarpine steps to the side waving Grizzltron through. He can't help but to
shake his head in pity for the poor irrational bot but he also wasn't happy
about what the other bot tried to do to Ice. Attempting to kill one of his
friends was something unforgivable and punishable by death, that was the
main thing that separated him from the Maximals he defected from. "There's
your way out" he said pointing back toward the way he'd entered, "Use it now
before I lose my temper!"

Ice waited outside worried about her love, she'd lost contact with the two
of them when she had to concentrate on not being crushed by the boulders
that had collapsed from the ceiling.

Sent: Friday, June 15, 2001 8:02 AM
Subject: Re: Say Welcome to Grizzltron


�Grizzltron�


   Grizzltron answered him, "Yes, it seems that I been messing with your
mind, So can I go now?"
